title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9950.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9950.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained

State Regulations

All requests from the public, or members of the news media, to inspect and/or copy records subject to public disclosure as provided by this

Part are to be made to the records access officer whose business address is: Empire State Plaza, Corning Tower, Albany, NY 12237. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9950.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
